answers.answer: I am experiencing the same thing.  I believe I am almost 6 weeks, and some days I'm extremely nauseous, and for the past two days. . . nothing.  I've heard pregnancy symptoms can come in waves, but I'm also nervous when I'm not experiencing any symptoms.

Congrats to you! I remember you also from when I was on the forum in 2008, I'm so happy you got your BFP!Yeah the only thing I had going for me was the sore bbs, and now that is practically gone. I hope it is just something that comes in waves and nothing to worry about. It took so long to get pregnant, so I am so worried every step of the way. I wish I could just relax, but there are so many unknowns.Wow, so we will be due around the same time together! I'm due July 4-5th.Thanks for the reply!

Pregnancy symptoms can fluctuate (come and go, vary in intensity etc) throughout pregnancy.  If you start to bleed, have bad cramps call your doctor immediately.  Of course, if you continue to have lack of symptoms and feel uneasy about it, call your doctor in that case too.

yup i agree with spade22, I had no symptoms like that, i actually only had nausea, i didnt even believe i was pregnant last time, no morning sickness no breast tenderness. Its different for every woman and every pregnancy. Have a Happy healthy 9 months :)

i feel the same way , sometimes i think my mind is playing tricks on me!! i feel so sick then the next day so much better!! maybe i still have symptoms just not as severe as they have been to notice! i dont know! i have another u/s next monday but i am probably gonna go in this friday to talk to the dr about my b/p and my blood sugars! i am only7 weeks pregnant but i have history of high blood pressure and diabetes!!!!!!!!
I had the same thing happen to me, i lost all symptoms at about the same time you have but it was the calm before the storm! they came back twice as bad. Good luck.
Thanks so much everyone for your thoughts. I get myself so worked up sometimes and worry. I couldn't even wait till tomorrow to ask my doctor at the first ultrasound. lol.

question: I have so many questions and concerns since this is my first pregnancy. I am almost 6 weeks, never had morning sickness and now my sore boobs just went away. Does this mean my levels are dropping off? I feel absolutely nothing.
title: Worried-Where did symptoms go?
